post.body: BTW - *deeply* disappointed it wasn't Julian Rhind-Tutt for #11. Maybe I'll get lucky with #12. Who knows.
Blog updated: Nell’s in the News http://tinyurl.com/8lqkne
Browsing: BBC NEWS | In Pictures | Your Pictures: 26 Dec - 2 Jan - that's our Nell, that is! http://tinyurl.com/7qch5d
New FO: Rene-FO-4 http://tinyurl.com/8knckt
More than ready for normality to be restored. Roll on Monday and the reassurance of routine...
Rivolo scarf is blocking. FO post ready to upload once photos are available.
Blog updated: Knitting Roundup Week 01/09 http://tinyurl.com/8952ox
Rivolo scarf is soaking pre-block. Next up, Water Socks for completion
Rivolo-a-go-go! My will ran out before the yarn did. Could have done 1, maybe 2 more repeats but was long past caring. Will block tomorrow.
Will this ball of yarn *never* end??
Welcome to Twitter, @knittydotcom
Making Fr onion soup. The house smells heavenly. Well, at least got rid of smell of heating fuel!
Blog updated: 2009 http://tinyurl.com/87kc6r
The Rayburn broke. *again*
Blog updated: All a-board http://tinyurl.com/a7ozzj
Baking: Oak Smoked Malted Bread rolls - for anniversary dinner tonight http://www.bacheldremill.co.uk/flourproducts.htm
Richard Allinson asked on the radio today if anywhere in the UK had sunshine today - implying an answer of "no". Come to sunny Orkney!
Home from town and shopping all packed away. Ready for GIN and a hot bath Kirkwall shops not yet properly restocked. Our effort not rewarded
Rivolo scarf is +8 pattern repeats - and there is still yarn left from100gms!
Blog updated: Points Mean Prizes http://tinyurl.com/8v38jr
